25677250554.text: Yes he did! An awesome ride by Geoff. RT @dirtytrucker08 @ErikBuellRacing he had the lead!, best race yet

25624645629.text: Geoff's race pace was great today. The guys found something. Another P6. Awesome ride today. Only 8 seconds off the winner after 21 laps.

25531565350.text: Geoff finishes P6 today on the 1125RR. Nicely done by rider and crew!

25506473358.text: Will start in P8 after a hard fought final Q session.  Quite a tight field. We're just a tenth or two from the front row. Nicely done Geoff!

25494611186.text: Day 2 of AMA race at beautiful @BarberMotorPark. Geoff is P11 so far, and should improve during this morning's final Q at 9:30AM  CST

25423986151.text: AMA Day 1 at Barber. Geoff's on track for 1st Q at 1:00 PM CST.

24681876412.text: Put up some autographed parts manuals on eBay. More rashed up bodywork going up soon.

24382297521.text: Geoff had a good weekend at the Barber WERA National with wins in F1, HW Twins, and Superbike aboard the 1125RR. Congrats to the team!

24137146658.text: RT @tubehifi @ErikBuellRacing Is EBR at Barber this weekend with WERA? >> Geoff, crew chief, and a single bike for some shake down work.

21237678791.text: 5th in morning warmup. Geoff shook down both bikes. Picked his favorite and we're good to go.

21230635082.text: OK we're back for day 2 at VIR. Morning warmup about to start. Yesterday's technical issues are hopefully behind us.

21150627571.text: http://twitvid.com/YKMBQ - Warming up for final Q

21148860790.text: Good morning. Final Q at 9:30 local time.  New numbers to match Geoff's Arai. http://tweetphoto.com/38901703

21093080424.text: That's it for Q1.  Excellent work with a little drama mixed in. Geoff's riding is hard. We're 5th heading into final Q

21092758746.text: Hanging onto 7th in Q1.  We get two more fliers.

21088296991.text: Crew chief Michael Tjon discussing changes with our Ohlins tech. http://tweetphoto.com/38719073

21088007829.text: 6th after the first session. Shock and fork changes for Q1this afternoon. Geoff says there's more on the bike. The boys are working hard.

21078551668.text: http://twitvid.com/LWARX - Getting ready for 1st practice. Hot, but overcast and breezy.

21074008874.text: We've relabeled our polishes. These cans look way better. #RatPakRecords http://tweetphoto.com/38685187

21066801998.text: AMA running with World Superbike 2011 Memorial Day weekend including Monday. Mark your calendars.

21002364615.text: On the ground in NC waiting on bags. The fun bus is already at VIR and the boys are setting up. A hot and fast weekend ahead for the 1125RR!

19495912877.text: Race day at Laguna Seca. Geoff grids 9th. Should be a good show!

19456078589.text: If our calcs are correct Geoff  starts inside the third row.  Nicely done!   1:26 oh He keeps picking up the pace.

19379639815.text: Nice! Geoff did his best lap on the last lap in 1st practice. 10th so far in a larger than normal field. Excellent start for rider and crew.

19298799609.text: Another note. Shawn Higbee will be racing an 1125R in Daytona Sportbike this weekend at Mazda Raceway Laguna Seca. Cheer on the EBR Buells!

19297951529.text: Geoff will represent EBR as best we can. Very much appreciated by cast and crew!  EBR at Laguna Seca with the 1125RR. Awesome fun.

19297784553.text: Setup day at Mazda Raceway at Laguna Seca. The boys are stoked to run the 1125RR tomorrow. Several more bikes entered in SBK than usual.

19011828303.text: Please RT: To the @ErikBuellRacing followers. Here's a good one to follow for all the AMA road racing updates.  @AMAProSBK

18863275713.text: A nice result today with the 1125RR at Mid Ohio. Geoff rode to a 9th place finish. Proves there still work to do as we prepare for Laguna.

18755648542.text: A quiet start at Mid Ohio for Geoff and the 1125RR. Provisional 12th in qualifying. The boys will work hard to find a good race pace today!

18564922464.text: Fun bus departed today for Mid-Ohio with Geoff's 1125RR's. Bueller's show up in force loud and proud! Bring your vuvuzelas for the XR1200's.

18156607013.text: The boys are busy in the shop prepping 1125RRs for b2b weekends at MidOhio and Laguna. Fresh bullets in each bike. 1190RR staying home :(

18125987776.text: Just did a cool interview with Tina Peek of The Big Rock Show...check it out here: http://www.ratpakrecordsamerica.com/erikbuell.cfm

17970124220.text: Giving a shout out to ASRA Pro Thunderbike winner Jay Smith aboard his XB12R at Road America. Classic draft pass at the line for the win!
